changelog:
- Improved spawn event triggers
- Improved support for relogging
- Set PlayerData.dead initial value based on `is_dead` column (or 0)
- Added a MySQL.store for the loadESXPlayer function
- Ammo sync now waits for the player to stop shooting before sending a server event
- /clearloadout now clears all player weapons on the first try
- Minor fixes and optimisations
